headline: McKesson (NYSE:MCK) Declares US$0.71 Dividend Per Share Payable July 2025
summary: McKesson (NYSE:MCK) recently issued a regular dividend of 71 cents per share, which may have been a positive indicator to investors. During the same quarter, the company reported strong third-quarter earnings with increased sales and net income, potentially supporting its 17.9% share price increase despite a U.S. economic contraction reported in the first quarter. Moreover, McKesson's introduction of the Precision Care Companion initiative reflects its commitment to innovation. These...

headline: McKesson (MCK) Earnings Expected to Grow: What to Know Ahead of Next Week's Release
summary: McKesson (MCK) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: McKesson Corporation Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of McKesson Corporation yesterday declared a regular dividend of 71 cents per share of common stock. The dividend will be payable on July 1, 2025, to stockholders of record on...
